Shen Lab Handbook Xiaotao Shen 2025-04-04 Chapter 1 About Shen Lab Shen lab is a research group in the Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine at Nanyang Technological University, Singapore. We are interested in method development for multi-omics and their applications in precision medicine. 1.1 How to find us? Shen lab website: https://shen-lab.org Shen lab GitHub: https://github.com/jaspershen-lab Shen lab Twitter: https://x.com/xiaotaoshen1990 1.2 Contact us Email: xiaotao.shen@ntu.edu.sg WeChat: jaspershen1990 Address: 59 Nanyang Dr, Singapore, Singapore 636921
